title: March Security update broke usb dac in exclusive mode (system crash/reboot) on pixels 4, 4 xl, 4a.
content:
hi, after march security update my both pixel 4 and 4 xl reboots after trying play music from my usb dacs (fiio btr5 and ibasso dc03) in exclusive mode (usb audio player, hiby, fiio music apps).
developers of those softwares said that is a bug in latest kernel from march security update on pixel 4, 4 xl and 4a...

when it will be fixed?
